ju#huyAqcCAnti#rEqvaiShA &gnErgupti#rAqtmanO# haqviShkRu#tOq vA EqSha yO$&gniM ci#nuqtE yathAq vai haqviH skanda#tyEqvaM ~MvA EqSha ska#ndatiq yO$&gniM ciqtvA striya#muqpaiti# maitrAvaruqNyA&&*mikSha#yA yajEta maitrAvaruqNatA#-
mEqvOpai$tyAqtmanO &ska#ndAyaq yO vA aqgnimRu#tuqsthAM ~MvEdaqrtur.Ru#turasmaiq kalpa#mAna Etiq pratyEqva ti#ShThati saM~MvathsaqrO vA aqgnir - [  ] 28
